content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation, electrical_id=28996.
- ElectricityGroup (id 28996) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings ["out of fuel"]; its fluid box holds water (amount ≈190.39, temperature 15) with connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)] and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); assigned fluid_system 154259.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake; status WORKING; its fluid box contains water (amount ≈99.25, temperature 15) and uses fluid_system 154259.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 154259, status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 154258, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 154271, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 154270, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 154266, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 154275, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 154274, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 154277, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 154278, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 154279, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated connection failures for pipe groups:
  - Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers [153595, 153679, 153761, 153845, 153927, 154011, 154093, 154177] near position (-5.5, 19.5) resulted in zero candidate pipe groups.
  - Tip: Confirm the presence and correct assignment of fluid_system identifiers for all nearby pipeline components before attempting connections.

• Inconsistent fluid_system assignments across pipeline components:
  - Discrepancies between the fluid_system values used during connection attempts and those reflected in the finalized pipeline network (now using identifiers [154259, 154258, 154271, 154270, 154266, 154275, 154274, 154277, 154278, 154279]) led to aborted connection attempts.
  - Tip: Synchronize fluid_system identifiers among the boiler, offshore pump, and all pipe groups to ensure reliable connection operations.

• Pre-validation of connection candidates:
  - Repeated unsuccessful searches indicate that verifying candidate availability (within the intended search radius) prior to each connection attempt can prevent redundant operations.
  - Tip: Implement a check for candidate pipe group existence before initiating connection attempts.
